name: BuffedShiba
description: BuffedShiba is a community driven token inspired by the commonly known Buff Doge meme. The $BSHIB token has the following characteristics: - Deflationary: 1% of each transaction will get sent to a burn address. - Anti-Whale: The maximum balance each wallet can hold is 0.5% of the total supply. - Auto-Liquidity: A certain percentage of each transaction will be added to liquidity.
